scripts.download: npm i concurrently && cd posts && npm install && cd ../comments && npm i && cd ../event-bus && npm i && cd ../moderation && npm i && cd ../query && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.start: concurrently "cd posts && npm start" "cd comments && npm start" "cd event-bus && npm start" "cd moderation && npm start" "cd query && npm start" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd posts && npm run dev" "cd comments && npm run dev" "cd event-bus && npm run dev" "cd moderation && npm run dev" "cd query && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
